name: Warlock's Keep
description:
Press tab to give the canvas focus. This is only needed for Itch's embedding thing; you can also see the game on Sevendral.com.

This game was written in seven days for the 2023 7DRL Challenge. I used Webassembly and Rust, and art assets from Kenney.nl (and some I drew). I had some of the game engine written for something else already (drawing pixels to the screen basically) but the game was all written this week.
